channel.title: Reverse engineering on Haroun Maghraoui
channel.description: Recent content in Reverse engineering on Haroun Maghraoui

item.title: Solving My First Keygenme
item.description: I’ve been wanting to dive in the reverse engineering field for a long time. But, everytime I start learning it I get frustrated and stop. I think this is a feeling that every rookie has faced at some point. So, this time, I decided that I should make a slight change in my learning process. I decided that I’m gonna add some fun and incentive to it, that’s why I choose to pursue one of my childhod dreams: cracking softwares.
